remarks: A commutative/associative law for Abelian groups.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)
statement:
abl4pnp.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
abl4pnp.2 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
ablo4pnp $p |- ( ( G e. AbelOp /\ ( ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ F e. X ) ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) D ( C G F ) ) = ( ( A D C ) G ( B D F ) ) ) $.
